meanings.definition: The position or office of a superintendent.
meanings.sent1: In the school district, the superintendency oversees all the principals and teachers.
meanings.sent2: She was promoted to the superintendency after years of hard work as a teacher.
meanings.sent3: The superintendency had to juggle budget cuts while maintaining high educational standards.
meanings.sent4: His approach to leadership transformed the superintendency into a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The superintendency's role is crucial in ensuring the smooth operation of the entire school system.

meanings.definition: The act or process of superintending.
meanings.sent1: Effective superintendency requires clear communication and strong organizational skills.
meanings.sent2: The superintendency of the construction project involved overseeing every detail from start to finish.
meanings.sent3: The cat took on the superintendency of the backyard, making sure all the birds stayed away.
meanings.sent4: Her superintendency of the event was flawless, ensuring everything ran according to plan.
meanings.sent5: The superintendency of the team by the coach led to their victory in the championship game.
